file_content.text: What the--a Republic soldier? How did you get in here?
In the name of the Galactic Republic, I order you to surrender!
Put your hands up!
Go ahead! Take me in, torture me! I'll reveal nothing!
The ZR-57! Tell me where it is--now!
Hand over the bomb!
I'll tell you nothing, Republic scum!
Got any last words, separatist scum?
Time to die.
You don't scare me! Kill me if you like, you won't make any difference!
The glorious separatist movement will never submit to your decadent, so-called Republic!
Hm. No bomb.
That's right! We're three steps ahead of you. Three hundred steps ahead! The separatist movement is an unstoppable force, driven by the will of the people.
Soon, you will all be eradicated as the downtrodden masses rise up to--
Enough. Kill him?
I'll follow your lead, Wraith.
It's your call.
Let's work the guy over a bit, make sure he doesn't know anything.
We should interrogate him.
This moron doesn't know anything. Let's off him and move on.
Yeah, kill him.
The--the glorious... you don't, you don't scare... me... I....
Wait, wait! The bomb! They moved it! They--they moved it!
We know the ZR-57 isn't here. Can you tell us where it is?
Where was the bomb taken?
You're just making this up so we won't kill you.
You're probably lying.
No! It's the truth--I swear!
Not so tough after all.
I don't want to die down here. I--I'm telling the truth--I swear!
My commander came, he... we took the bomb down to the coast and loaded it onto a seaspeeder.
I don't know where it was taken after that.
I think we've found everything there is to find here. Should we return to base?
Are we done, Wraith?
No.
Now what do we do?
We think.
I've had it with these false leads. I say we kill this guy on principle.
I can't believe this!
Wait.
Extensive security. Why?
It's because... well... Saphrro, Vyru and Bol are here. Three of our greatest heroes who lead us in our glorious--
They're, uh, they're officers. Cell commanders. They run operations in different parts of Avilatan. They're having a conference, relocating men to different cells. They're--
They're dead. Sergeant?
I'll take care of them, sir.
Consider it done.
Maybe taking out these officers will actually be challenging.
Finally, a fun assignment.
I came here for the bomb, not officers.
This isn't my mission.
Saphrro, Vyru and Bol are priority-one targets, Sergeant. And recovering their data on separatist cell locations and manpower is too good an opportunity to pass up.
That data will be critical to learning the bomb's movements before it's too late.
You have your orders. Get the data. Kill the officers.
I'm gone.
You can count on me.
You're a lady of few words, Wraith.
Not much for talking, are you?
Go.
The separatist movement will never be defeated!
